name: Entice Fey, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Intrigue © 2016, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (offerings worth 2,500 gp plus payment), DF
effect: up to three called fey, totaling no more than 18 Hit Dice, no two of which can appear more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions as lesser entice fey, except the spell's whimsical calling can produce a single fey of 18 Hit Dice or less, or up to three fey of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 18.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（报酬外加价值2500gp的祭品，见后文），法器
effect_zh: 至多3个被呼唤的精类，总生命骰不超过18，这些精类彼此之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同次等引诱精类（Entice Fey, Lesser）一般，不过法术那无法预料的呼唤效果能引来单个生命骰为18或更低的精类，或者至多3个相同种类的精类（其总生命骰不超过18）。
